title: Riot's recent LCSDRIVE video is surprisingly good

embed.description: This is Gravity's support player, Michael Kurylo. Join us as we take an inside look at Bunny FuFuu's LCS career and find out what drives him to compete in the LCS.

body: Props to Riot; I think they hit the nail on the head with this one. Sometimes videos like this turn out cringeworthy, but this one was done very well. Also, stuff like this really lets us bond with the players. It adds character development where otherwise there wouldn't be any, and I think that's very important to building up the LCS fanbase.
